concept.title: Examples of EXEX single-length and double-length keys in two forms

titlealts.navtitle: Examples of EXEX single-length and double-length keys in two forms
titlealts.searchtitle: (): Examples of EXEX single-length and double-length keys in two forms

concept.shortdesc: Examples of IMEX single-length and double-length keys in two forms.

conbody.p: For the keys shown in the following list, you are providing key distribution services for other nodes in your network, or other cryptographic partners. Neither key type can be used in your installation.
conbody.codeblock:
Key Type Type Form 1 2
EXEX DATA DATA Send the first EX form to a cryptographic EXEX MAC MACVER partner with the corresponding IMPORTER and EXEX IMPORTER EXPORTER send the second EX form to another EXEC OPINENC IPINENC cryptographic partner with the corresponding IMPORTER. This exchange establishes a key between two partners.
